item.title: The House Hot Sheet for Week 1 of the 2025 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats
item.description: News article "The House Hot Sheet for Week 1 of the 2025 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats" from House Democrats.

item.title: 👎💵Lindsey Hueer - Association of Washington Business
item.description: Lindsey Hueer signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Business. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Jeremiah Miller - Fair Work Center
item.description: Jeremiah Miller signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Fair Work Center.

item.title: 👍Jeremiah Miller - Fair Work Center
item.description: Jeremiah Miller signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Fair Work Center.

item.title: 👎💵Mike Burgess - WA State Fairs Association
item.description: Mike Burgess signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent WA State Fairs Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Jesse Wing - Washington Employment Lawyers Association
item.description: Jesse Wing signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington Employment Lawyers Association.

item.title: 👍Sung Shin - Washington Employment Lawyers Association
item.description: Sung Shin signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: 👍Taifa Harris - Washington Employment Lawyers Association
item.description: Taifa Harris signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: 👍Joe Kendo - WA State Labor Council
item.description: Joe Kendo signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent WA State Labor Council.

item.title: 👍Tanya Donovan - WA State Labor Council
item.description: Tanya Donovan signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: 👎💵Rowland Thompson - Washington State Association of Broadcasters
item.description: Rowland Thompson signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington State Association of Broadcasters. They are a registered lobbyist.
